name: Joshua_bot
description: A general purpose plugins based Telegram bot written in Ruby

name: Gitron
description: A web game using GitHub APIs based on Tron movies

name: Spioncino
description: A Telegram bot connected to a Raspberry Pi camera and a motion sensor to watch over your college dorm room

name: Pumping Wars
description: A game about two university professors who have to fight each other until one of them eventually becomes the ultimate computer science god

name: Rubomote
description: A small Ruby web app which allows you to control iTunes using a web interface

name: SoftScript Parser
description: This is a parser for an invented programming language called SoftScript, made for a university exam

name: Retrocomputing
description: This is a repository containing some tests I've made on old computers I was able to recover from thrift shops and online

name: Logosweeper
description: My very first React JS app, mostly made to learn the library and to have some fun with Gil Barbara's SVG repository
